EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: How important is Platform and Cloud Portability?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/platform-and-cloud-portability]]> Join your host <[[http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/platform-and-cloud-portability]]> Michael Cot√© of Pivotal in a conversation with Holger Mueller of Constellation Research and Brian Gregory of Express Scripts International about why multi-cloud capabilities are an important differentiator when choosing an application framework.
Regardless of whether an organization ever moves its workloads from on-premise to a public cloud or from one IaaS to another, multi-cloud portability has become a requisite expectation that gives customers the confidence to choose the architectural paradigm best aligned with where they are in their digital transformation journey.
Event details: Wednesday, August 31 11:00AM PDT
Register Here <[[http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/platform-and-cloud-portability]]>
We look forward to you joining us.
The Pivotal Team
